games.title: One Man Army: Battle Game
games.description: One Man Army: A casual single player Battle Game that will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.
games.howToPlayText:
Are you ready for the fun challenge in this defensive battle strategy game? One Man Army: Battle Game puts you in the shoes of an unstoppable warrior defending yourself and testing your reflexes against enemy attacks. With a variety of skills and upgrades at your disposal, you can upgrade your armory and become an unstoppable force.

As a One Man Army, you must use your battle tactics to defend and survive enemy attacks. The game tests your reflexes and strategic skills as you face wave after wave of enemy soldier's attacks. You must be quick on your feet, using the right tactics to outsmart your opponents and emerge victorious.

With each battle won you earn points to rank up, upgrade your armory and enhance your battle skills. Armory upgrades include everything from new weapons and armor to protective gear and shields. By climbing up the ranks you claim them all to be a champion battle warrior.

One Man Army: Battle Game will test your warrior skills and battle reflexes. With challenging levels and intense battles, you must use your tactical skills to survive and defend against arrows, canon, and even dragon flames.

The game features easy Battle game mechanics and realistic sound effects, immersing you to test your reflexes and battle tactics in this challenging game. Youâ€™ll feel like youâ€™re on the front lines of the battlefield action, and defending against enemy attack with every move you make.

One Man Army: Battle Game is the perfect game for anyone who loves a challenge. Are you ready to rule the battlefield and emerge victorious? Play One Man Army: Battle Game now and find out!

games.title: Build Your Zombie Horde
games.description: Your ZOMBIES await! Summon the undead horde, defeat enemies, collect resources, upgrade your army and conquer lands! A fun and simple strategy autobattler!
games.howToPlayText:

ðŸ–¥ On PC:

games.title: Musketeers Gunpowder vs Steel
games.description: Musketeers: Gunpowder vs Steel is an exciting free-to-play strategy game set in the 17th century. Command a team of diverse soldiers, issuing orders and making vital choices during intense battles. Available on iOS, Android, and desktop, itâ€™s ideal for fans of historical tactics.
games.howToPlayText:
Left Mouse Button or Joystick: Control the commanderâ€™s movement
Q: Turn Squad Left
W: Move Squad Forward
E: Turn Squad Right
A: Squad Follows the Player
S: Stop Squad Movement
D: Indicate Target for Squad
X: Move Squad Backwards
F: Fire Pistol
V: Mount Horse
Space: Switch Camera View

games.title: Epic Battle Simulator
games.description:
Epic Battle Simulator throws you into a thrilling warzone where strategy meets non-stop action!
Train and upgrade your army, push your limits to reach record-breaking levels, and crush enemy forces before they breach your base.
Unleash powerful units, plan your attacks wisely, and prove your dominance on the battlefield.
Will your defenses hold the line, or will the enemy break through?

Join the fight and become the ultimate commander!
games.howToPlayText:
Epic Battle Simulator is the ultimate blend of strategy, action, and idle gameplay, offering an endlessly captivating experience.
Construct your defenses, unleash mighty heroes, and safeguard your castle from waves of relentless invaders in this immersive battle simulator.

games.title: Epic Battle Simulator 2
games.description:
Epic Battle Simulator 2 â€“ Strategy, Warfare, and Tactics Like Never Before!
Master the art of war in this next-level battle simulation! Craft your own tactics, choose from a wide range of troops, and position your army with precision to outsmart your enemies. Whether you''re conquering campaign levels or creating custom battles, every fight is a new challenge.

Upgrade your forces to the max and experience stunning visuals, lifelike physics, and hilarious ragdoll effects. With smarter AI, improved graphics, and an upgraded unit placement system, youâ€™re in for the most intense and realistic battle simulations yet.

Key Features:
- Realistic physics and dynamic ragdoll effects
- Improved troop placement system for advanced strategy
- Upgrade armies across 3 levels with powerful equipment and boosted stats
- Enhanced visuals that make every battle epic
- Intelligent AI for authentic and unpredictable combat

Ready to command your army and rewrite the rules of battle? Join the fight now!
games.howToPlayText:
Controls: 

For PC/Keyboard:    
- Camera movement: Use the W, A, S, D  keys.
     
For Mobile Devices/Touchscreen:    
- Camera movement: Touch the bottom left of the screen and drag it.

games.title: Strike Force: Action Platformer
games.description:
Jump, shoot, and power up in this action-packed platformer!
Dive into an exciting adventure through colorful levels filled with enemies and non-stop action! Run along the route, dodge bullets, and fight off enemies attacking from all sides â€” charging straight at you, dropping in with parachutes, or firing from cover.

Collect ammo to stay in the fight, and make sure to blast enemy drones for powerful weapon upgrades. Unlock a roster of unique characters and grow stronger with every battle.

Game features:

Vibrant, eye-catching graphics

Intense shootouts with a variety of enemies

Explosive drone takedowns and weapon upgrades

A collection of heroes with different looks

Simple controls and addictive gameplay

ðŸŽ® Ready for battle? Jump in and show them what youâ€™re made of!

games.title: Strategy of war: Tanks and helicopters
games.description: War Strategy: Tanks and Helicopters is an engaging online strategy game where you lead forces to seize enemy strongholds. Play seamlessly on various devices without downloading. Enjoy tactical combat as you use tanks and helicopters to succeed in this skill-testing military challengeâ€”no registration needed.
games.howToPlayText: Select a base to move or attack, click once for half the troops, twice for all, and remember that moving between ground and air bases requires double the troops.

games.title: Roots and Wheels
games.description:
This exciting simulator presents you with an ambitious task: get behind the wheel of a powerful truck and transport as many crates as possible through dangerous and unpredictable locations to your destination.


Success depends on your skillâ€”your ability to feel the vehicle and react to road conditionsâ€”and your witsâ€”your ability to find the best solutions in difficult situations, whether it's mud, steep climbs, or destroyed bridges. Every box delivered brings you closer to your reward.


By earning money for completed trips, you get the opportunity to upgrade your truck â€“ from the engine to the suspension to the wheels â€“ and better equip it for the challenges of the terrain.


You can also buy new vehicle models, expanding your options and gaining access to new types of missions and cargo. Show what a real driver can do!

Translated with DeepL.com (free version)
games.howToPlayText:
Get behind the wheel of the powerful military Ural in this exciting simulation game! The driver of the military Ural challenges you not just to drive, but to deliver valuable cargo skillfully. Your task is to drive through complex tracks and bring to the finish line as many boxes as possible, using your agility to maneuver and wit to find the best solutions in difficult situations off-road.

The controls are intuitive, whether you're playing on your phone or computer. On mobile devices you control the movement with touch pedals: right - forward, left - backward. On the computer you use the keys: D for forward and A for backward.

Earn money. Invest it in improvements for your machines. Or save up to buy new cars - each with its own unique capabilities, ready for the most extreme tests. Expand your fleet, improve your skills and become the best off-road driver!
